segments.text: Are you interested in going sightseeing , Mr . Simpson ? I think you are here not only for the negotiation but also for sightseeing .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: I heard that there are some beauty spots and places of historical interest in this city .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Shall we go to the Tiananmen Square first ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: That's great . I trouble you so much . Thank you very much .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: It's my pleasure . Shall we go there on foot ? It's very near .
segments.speaker: S1
